import{c as p,j as c,A as _,n,l as a,q as t,t as o,v as s,k as f,a5 as u,ah as h,x as y}from"./frappe-ui-C71hWP7q.js";import g from"./ListItem-DFSd-WXY.js";import{S as w}from"./ShiftIcon-CJ_5ruA1.js";import{d as x,e as v}from"./attendance-itKazsfi.js";import"./EmployeeAvatar-BSuwc1cA.js";import"./index-DVMUZnKy.js";const k={class:"flex flex-col items-start gap-1.5"},S={class:"text-base font-normal text-gray-800"},q={class:"text-xs font-normal text-gray-500"},R={key:0},B={class:"whitespace-nowrap"},O={__name:"ShiftRequestItem",props:{doc:{type:Object},isTeamRequest:{type:Boolean,default:!1},workflowStateField:{type:String,required:!1}},setup(i){const e=i,r=p(()=>e.workflowStateField?e.doc[e.workflowStateField]:e.doc.docstatus?e.doc.status:"Open"),d={Approved:"green",Rejected:"red",Open:"orange"};return(m,l)=>(c(),_(g,{isTeamRequest:e.isTeamRequest,employee:e.doc.employee,employeeName:e.doc.employee_name},{left:n(()=>[a(w,{class:"h-5 w-5 text-gray-500"}),t("div",k,[t("div",S,o(e.doc.shift_type),1),t("div",q,[t("span",null,o(e.doc.shift_dates||s(x)(e.doc)),1),e.doc.to_date?(c(),f("span",R,[l[0]||(l[0]=t("span",{class:"whitespace-pre"}," Â· ",-1)),t("span",B,o(m.__("{0}d",[e.doc.total_shift_days||s(v)(e.doc)])),1)])):u("",!0)])])]),right:n(()=>[a(s(h),{variant:"outline",theme:d[r.value],label:r.value,size:"md"},null,8,["theme","label"]),a(s(y),{name:"chevron-right",class:"h-5 w-5 text-gray-500"})]),_:1},8,["isTeamRequest","employee","employeeName"]))}};export{O as default};
